content: --पुत्रः {1} son of an honourable man. {2} the son of a spiritual preceptor. {3} honorific designation of the son of the elder brother; of a husband by his wife; or of a prince by his general &c. {4} the son of the father-in-law, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} a husband (occurring in every drama; mostly in the vocative case in the last two senses).
